ModMetaData.name: Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Security CE [WIP]
ModMetaData.author: Andross
ModMetaData.description: Vanilla Security Expanded Combat Extended Patch\n\nThis is a Work In Progress mod as of now most of the buildings should work with the exception of the artillery only working on the home map only (like a normal mortar). Ability to hit other map cells will be added later.
